mapper.select: SELECT p.pro_no, pro_name FROM project p, support s WHERE c_NO = (SELECT c_no FROM client WHERE S_EMAIL = #{value}) AND p.pro_no = s.pro_no AND s.su_state = '완료' group by p.pro_no, pro_name
SELECT S_Email FROM partners WHERE p_no IN (SELECT p_no FROM support WHERE pro_no = #{value} AND su_state = '완료')
